channel.name: BBC One NL
channel.title: Homes Under the Hammer
channel.desc: Dion heads to Crewe in Cheshire to see a four-bed terrace with tonnes of original character and charm. Martel is in Accrington, Lancashire, visiting a two-bed mid-terrace that is a bit dark and dingy in places. Tommy is in Norwich, where a three-bed terrace takes him back to the 1970s.
